column6:
"MAGICAL",2006,8
The mysterious Magician's standing with the X-Men is put to the test as questions about his past begin to surface. Did he lie to gain entry to the group? Do his actions belie his true motivations? Just what is this strange young man all about? Meanwhile, a tormented Jean Grey is having great difficulty dealing with the results of the Shi'ar testing. Elsewhere... Dazzler stirs. Part 2 of 3.
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Gina Going | inker:Scott Hanna | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Tom Raney
